oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Pvt. William Burton to his parents
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pvt. William Burton, Co. F, 2nd Ky. Cav., USA, wrote his parents James and Elizabeth Burton from Camp Nevin in Kentucky on stationery bearing an image of Maj. Gen. George McClellan. He sent $10 home with Thomas Minor and said that he would try to send $20 of his next $30 in pay.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
